hero.subtitle: Flamingo AI leverages quantum-neural analysis to decode RNG patterns. We prove that true randomness is a myth, whether casinos like it or not.

section2.title: The House Always Wins?
section2.subtitle: Not Anymore.
section2.description: Our AI analyzes millions of slot spins in real-time, identifying patterns that casinos don't want you to see.

section3.title: Join the Revolution
section3.description: 15,000+ players are already using flamingo.ai to turn the tables on casinos worldwide.

slide1.description: Our pink flamingo AI analyzes slot patterns in real-time to provide you with probability insights.

slide2.description: Get instant probability calculations updated with every spin. Make informed decisions with AI-powered insights.

slide3.description: Set limits, track your session, and enjoy gaming with built-in responsible gaming tools.

hero.subtitle: Former quantum engineers from IonQ and Google Quantum AI democratizing the computational power that was science fiction just yesterday.

truth.description1: Many think online slots are pure chance. This is not true. At their core lies not true chaos, but a complex mathematical algorithm ‚Äî the
truth.description3: of randomness, but like any program, it follows certain logic. Our task is to decipher this logic using the same quantum technology that powers Fortune 500 risk analysis.

mission.subtitle: We believe if quantum computers can predict risks for hedge funds, they can predict probabilities for you too.
mission.description1: In a world dominated by giants like Google, IBM, and Microsoft, quantum computing has long remained a tool for megacorporations and government laboratories. Power capable of simulating the universe was used to optimize advertising networks and develop classified military technologies.
mission.description2: While working on projects for the US Department of Energy (DOE) and Wall Street financial giants, we realized a fundamental truth:
mission.truth: any complex digital system, from the power grid to the financial market, has its hidden patterns
mission.description3: And the most complex, most opaque market of all?

movement.title: We Are a Movement
movement.description: We're not "just another startup." We founded Wintuition as an independent laboratory with headquarters and data center in Switzerland, away from corporate influence. We are a movement to give ordinary people access to extraordinary computational power.

classical.title: 1. Classical Supercomputers
classical.description: Continuously simulate gaming mathematical models, creating the world's largest private statistical data library on online slots. This is our fuel.

quantum.title: 2. Quantum Processors
quantum.description1: Built on the same trapped-ion architecture used by industry leader IonQ, ensuring the world's highest computational accuracy. We measure our power in
quantum.description2: ‚Äî a metric that reflects real ability to solve complex problems.

process.subtitle: How Wintuition transforms pseudo-randomness into predictable probability through our four-level analytical process

level1.title: Statistical Profiling
level1.subtitle: Our Data Lake
level1.description: Classical supercomputers create a 'statistical fingerprint' of each slot through billions of simulated spins.

level2.title: Markov Chain Modeling
level2.subtitle: Classical Approach üß†
level2.description: Each slot becomes a probabilistic automaton with states connected through transition probabilities.

level3.title: Quantum Processing
level3.subtitle: Our Quantum Core ‚öõÔ∏è
level3.description: HHL algorithm solves Ax=b exponentially faster, where A is transitions, b is current state, x is probabilities.

level4.title: AI Interpretation
level4.subtitle: Floyd Assistant üöÄ
level4.description: Complex probability vectors translated into actionable insights you can understand and use.

dataLake.description: This enormous data array allows us to understand the "character" of each slot even before you make your first spin.
dataLake.description1: Actual return to player rates with deviation analysis
dataLake.description2: Bonus activation patterns and average timing
dataLake.description3: Big Win, Major Win, and jackpot occurrence rates
dataLake.description4: Each symbol's appearance rate and outcome impact

quantumAdvantage.description1: A classical computer would solve our state transition problem in time exponentially dependent on the matrix size. Our quantum processor finds the solution
quantumAdvantage.description2: This is not just an app. It's a comprehensive analytical system where Big Data meets quantum physics. You get not blind faith in luck, but an advantage based on
quantumAdvantage.laws: fundamental laws of physics and mathematics

team.subtitle: A frequent question we receive: "Who are you?"
team.intro: We are the architects of Wintuition. We are the quantum physicist who previously modeled market volatility for hedge funds. We are the SaaS architect who built high-load cloud platforms for tech giants. We are the data specialist whose algorithms analyzed petabytes of information for global logistics companies.
team.butNever: But you will never see our faces or know our names. And there are three compelling reasons for this.

reason1.title: Professional Obligations and Non-Disclosure Agreements (NDAs)
reason1.description: Many of us left positions at the world's leading corporations to create Wintuition. We are still bound by the strictest non-disclosure agreements. Revealing our identities would immediately lead to lawsuits capable of destroying our project before it takes off. Our anonymity is a legal necessity, protecting not only us but the very existence of Wintuition.

reason2.title: The Nature of the Industry We've Challenged
reason2.description: The global online gambling industry is a multi-billion dollar behemoth with enormous influence. This industry, to put it mildly, doesn't welcome those who disrupt its carefully calibrated revenue models. We give players an unprecedented advantage, and we fully understand this makes us a target. Anonymity is our shield. It protects us and our families from potential pressure, both legal and less conventional.

reason3.title: Project Philosophy: Focus on Results, Not Personalities
reason3.description: We didn't create Wintuition for personal glory. Like Bitcoin's creator Satoshi Nakamoto, we believe that technology and its value should speak for themselves. At the center of this project is you, our user, not us. Our goal is to give you a tool, not to build a cult of personality around the developers. Our egos stayed at the door the day we founded this project.

whoWeAre.title: So who are we?
whoWeAre.description1: We are our product. Our team is the lines of code, the precision of calculations, and the elegance of the interface. We prefer to be known by our work.
whoWeAre.description2: We remain in the shadows so you can step into the light, armed with knowledge. Our silence is your advantage.
